page.title: 01REVIEW OF BLOCK
page.content: The south east corner of the block touches the northernmost edge of Bedworth.The north east corner takes in a section of Nuneaton,the town in which our school,Stockingford Middle,is situated.Approximately 85% of the area is woodland and farmland (cattle,sheep and arable). 04320288 Cowley Wood and farmland. 04330288 The South Farm 04340288 The Mill Farm,woodland,cattle 04350288 Collycroft;Bedworth by-pass 04320289 Temple Ho;part of Arbury Park 04330289 Arbury Hall,park and lakes 04340289 The Dennis Farm,mainly arable 04350289 Bermuda Village;site of moat 04320290 Tower Farm;Seeswood Pool;wood 04330290 Arbury est.;Alderman Smith School;residential. 04340290 Residential;industrial;arable 04350290 Residential;George Eliot Hospital;Middlemarch Middle School.
